IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. PRODUCT-CACHE-LOOKUP.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 PRODUCT-CODE PIC X(12).
       01 CACHE-RESULT PIC X(200).
       01 RETURN-CODE PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE 'PROD-ABC-123' TO PRODUCT-CODE
           CALL 'CACHE-RETRIEVE' USING PRODUCT-CODE CACHE-RESULT RETURN-CODE
           IF RETURN-CODE = 00
               DISPLAY 'Product details: ' CACHE-RESULT
           END-IF
           STOP RUN.

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. INVENTORY-CACHE.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 ITEM-SKU PIC X(15).
       01 QUANTITY PIC 9(5).
       01 CACHE-KEY PIC X(20).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE 'SKU-WIDGET-9876' TO ITEM-SKU
           MOVE 150 TO QUANTITY
           STRING 'INV-' ITEM-SKU DELIMITED BY SPACE INTO CACHE-KEY
           CALL 'MEMCACHED-PUT' USING CACHE-KEY QUANTITY
           DISPLAY 'Inventory cached for ' ITEM-SKU
           STOP RUN.

WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 ACCOUNT-BALANCE PIC 9(10)V99.
       01 ACCOUNT-NUMBER PIC 9(12).
       01 DATABASE-CONNECTION PIC X(30).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       MOVE 'PRIMARY_DB' TO DATABASE-CONNECTION.

       PROGRAM-ID. ORDER-MUTATION.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 ORDER-MUTATION PIC X(300).
       01 HTTP-STATUS PIC 9(3).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           STRING 'mutation { createOrder(input: { customerId: 123, '
                  'items: [{ productId: 456, quantity: 2 }] }) { id } }'
                  DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO ORDER-MUTATION.
           CALL 'GRAPHQL-CLIENT' USING ORDER-MUTATION HTTP-STATUS.
           IF HTTP-STATUS = 200
               DISPLAY 'Order created successfully'
           END-IF.
           STOP RUN.

       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 UDP-BROADCAST-ADDR PIC X(15) VALUE '255.255.255.255'.
       01 ALERT-MESSAGE PIC X(100).
       01 UDP-SOCKET-FD PIC 9(8) COMP.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       MOVE 'SYSTEM ALERT: Database backup complete' TO ALERT-MESSAGE.
       CALL 'UDP-BROADCAST' USING UDP-SOCKET-FD
                                 BY REFERENCE UDP-BROADCAST-ADDR
                                 BY REFERENCE ALERT-MESSAGE.
       DISPLAY 'UDP broadcast sent to network'.
       STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
func (h *ProductHandler) GetProduct(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
	productID := mux.Vars(r)["id"]
	cacheKey := "product:" + productID
	if cachedData, found := h.cache.Get(cacheKey); found {
		w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
		w.Write(cachedData.([]byte))
		return
	}
	product := h.service.FetchProduct(productID)
	response, _ := json.Marshal(product)
	h.cache.Set(cacheKey, response, 5*time.Minute)
	w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
	w.Write(response)
}

        return $product;
    }
}

    public function getUser($userId) {

        $userData = $this->cache->get($cacheKey);
        if (!$userData) {

        }
        return $userData;

}

class BackupManager {
    private function transferBackupViaFtp($backupFile) {
        $ftpServer = 'backup.storage.com';
        $resource = ftp_connect($ftpServer, 21, 30);
        ftp_login($resource, $this->ftpUser, $this->ftpPassword);
        ftp_mkdir($resource, '/backups/' . date('Y-m-d'));
        return ftp_put($resource, '/backups/' . date('Y-m-d') . '/backup.tar.gz', $backupFile, FTP_BINARY);
    }
}

class OrderSyncService {
    public function syncOrdersToWarehouse($orders) {
        $queryBuilder = new QueryBuilder();
        $mutation = $queryBuilder->mutation('createOrders', ['orders' => $orders]);

            'json' => ['query' => $mutation->getQuery()]
        ]);
    }
}

    user = authenticate_user(params[:email], params[:password])
    if user
      Rails.cache.write("session:#{user.id}", user.to_json, expires_in: 1.hour)
      render json: { token: generate_token(user) }
    else
      render json: { error: 'Invalid credentials' }, status: 401
    end
  end
end

module CacheHelper
  def cache_expensive_calculation(key, ttl = 3600)
    Rails.cache.fetch(key, expires_in: ttl) do
      yield if block_given?
    end
  end

  def invalidate_cache_pattern(pattern)
    Rails.cache.delete_matched(pattern)
  end
end

  end

import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory
import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel

class NotificationService {
  def sendEmailNotification(userId: String, message: String): Unit = {
    val factory = new ConnectionFactory()
    val connection = factory.newConnection()
    val channel = connection.createChannel()
    val queueName = "email-notifications"
    channel.queueDeclare(queueName, false, false, false, null)
    val payload = s"$userId:$message"
    channel.basicPublish("", queueName, null, payload.getBytes)
    connection.close()
  }
}
